description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission ref: 223366FUL dated 15/02/2023 for: Conversion of existing building from 6no. flats into 9no. self-contained residential units; single storey, part 2 storey and part 3 storey, side/rear/side (wraparound) extension; creation of balconies and roof terraces to rear elevation; rear roof extension including increase in ridge height; alterations to fenestration; installation of front boundary wall; and provision of associated amenity space, car parking, refuse and cycle storage. Amendment seeks alterations to the size and positioning of rear fenestration; alterations to positioning of windows to north flank elevation; level changes to side passage and repositioning of approved access gate; and provision of further detail in relation to construction methodology with reference to the front fa√ßade
decision_conditions: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the above drawings and documents; Cover letter dated 23.08.2023, 7369/08 REV J Proposed Elevation 1 (Front), 7369/09 REV J Proposed Elevation 2 (North Flank), 7369/10 REV J Proposed Elevation 3 (Rear), 7369/11 REV J Proposed Elevation 4 (South Flank), 7369/02 Rev J, 7369/03 Rev J, 7369/04 Rev J, 7369/05 Rev J, 7369/06 Rev J, 7369/07 Rev J, received 23.08.2023, Supporting Document, 7369/NMA/100 Rev J, 7369/NMA/101 Rev J, 7369/NMA/102 Rev J, 7369/NMA/103 Rev J, dated November 2023
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
